The '''Rivil''' was a lesser tributary of the River [[Sirion|Sirion]]. Its source was [[Rivil's Well]] in the highlands of [[Dorthonion]], from which it flowed westward to meet the Sirion at the [[Fen of Serech]].<ref>{{S|Map}}</ref>

==History==
In {{FA|472}}, before the [[Nirnaeth Arnoediad]], the army that [[Morgoth]] sent to draw out [[Fingon]] was staged above the [[Sirion]], from the inflowing of Rivil to the walls of [[Eithel Sirion]] to the north.<ref>{{S|Fifth}}</ref>

In the latter stages of the Nirnaeth Arnoediad, King [[Turgon]] retreated down the [[Pass of Sirion]]. His escape was successful because [[Húrin]] and [[Huor]] formed a rearguard that used the Rivil as a defence. The host of [[Angband]] bridged the stream with the corpses of their dead. Huor was slain beside the Rivil and Húrin was captured.<ref>{{CH|2}}, p. 59</ref>
